website_summaries.verdict: This very accurate Millennium Falcon will appeal to adult Star Wars fans and collectors.
pros: More than 7,000 pieces in this set
Challenging to put together, but worth the effort
Large when completed – nearly 2 by 3 feet
cons: Not a set for playing with
You will want to display it when finished

customer_reviews.title: A giant LEGO Millennium Falcon.
customer_reviews.text: You already know if a $800 box of plastic bricks that will resemble the Millennium Falcon when finished is something up your alley. If you are that sort of person, you won't be disappointed in it. Thing is massive. The instructions actually have images to show you how to properly lift it and move it around. I clocked roughly 21 hrs total build time. I'm not sure if that's fast or slow. Make sure you not only have somewhere spacious to build it but also somewhere in mind to put it before starting. One look at the manual (see pic) when you take it out of the box and you'll get an idea of what you're in for.
customer_reviews.author: Brain

customer_reviews.title: Got it where it counts...
customer_reviews.text: I won this hunk of junk in a card game. Fastest ship in the galaxy if you ask me. A little rough around the edges but hey it’s got a working Dejarik board so that’s sweet. Has panels for hiding stuff from Imperial inspections and the seats in the cockpit recline a good amount. Easily meets the advertised 12 parsec jump time. Downsides: she’s real ugly. If your trying to get a date with like a princess or something, she’s probably not going to be too impressed. And there’s this distinctive wet Wookie smell eminating from it. Not sure if it’s something a couple dozen air fresheners can take care of or not.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this!
customer_reviews.text: For anticipation, fun, family time and shear WOW factor, this product gets a 5 of 5 ! ! ! Since we all love it, why a 4 of 5 then? The interior/floor plan of this is not complete or consistent with the movie layout. Getting into the few usable spaces is also not so user-friendly. The design is not really solid, so it can't easily be picked up – pretty much just for looking. That said, we still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Quill

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship and wonderful distraction.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Really impressive amount of detail and presentation. You can really tell artists created it and that there was true passion behind the project. I bought it to take a break from technology, computer and phone screens all day. It's a great emotional relief. It makes me focus on a task instead of stressing about day-to-day troubles at work or home.
customer_reviews.author: kajunkerspunk

customer_reviews.title: THE Lego Set!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how you can NOT give this five stars! If you can get your hands on this set, get it! It is the largest production set ever! It is HUGE! The box itself is more like an end table than anything else. This will provide many hours of fun! This is not for beginners or young children.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but if you are a Star Wars and Lego fan, you won't be disappointed. The box arrived undamaged, and it was very nice that the pieces were arranged in bags according to the phases of the build. All in all, the total assembly took just under 50 hours of work, but I was trying to enjoy it and not go for speed. There's a lot of cool details that reveal themselves as the build progresses, which adds to the enjoyment of the process. This thing is massive, so make sure you have a large work area and have a spot picked out to display it when you are done.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Step 1: Add to cart and buy...don't think about it..click. Step 2: Wait two painstaking days for it to arrive. Step 3: Call in sick for a week. Go to build town and get busy. Step 4: Try and find some place to display. 36" x30"x10". 😊 Step 5: Buy Hogwarts Castle. Repeat steps 1-4.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy build - nothing is held on very well :(
customer_reviews.text: While I enjoyed the time building it and the attention to detail put into this model, this is the flimsiest Lego set I've ever owned. I can't pick it up ANYwhere (even where the instructions tell me to) without several pieces falling off in the process. Of course I'm not going to remember where these pieces go, so there I am spending a lot of time looking through the manual where to put them back on. The worse is when you try to fit the 3rd party stand onto it. Good luck on that one!
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Most impressive LEGO kit to date!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate LEGO kit...probably the greatest that LEGO has ever offered. Expensive? Yes. Worth it? YES!!! I bought it as a collectors item. Maybe someday I’ll build it. Maybe not. When you encounter the size and weight of the box, you’ll need to take a step back and think, “Am I ready for this project?!” Note that LEGO does a great job of packaging this set for shipment. And kudos to Amazon for packing it in yet a bigger box to guarantee very safe shipment to your home. Be prepared, LEGO fans: this is the biggest box you’ll (maybe ever) see!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stereoman

customer_reviews.title: Challenging and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the BEST Lego build I have ever done. I am thoroughly enjoying taking my time putting it together. The detail work is beyond compare to any other Lego set. It's challenging and fun! The instructions manual is more than a step-by-step booklet, it gives you an inside look at the design process for a Master Builder. If you are a serious Lego aficionado, then you need to have the Lego Star Wars UCSMF as part of your Lego collection. Happy building!
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt E Carrier III

customer_reviews.title: This has been amazing so far
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing so far. We've been putting ~4 hours each night, completing 1 or 2 sections (bags) per night. Pretty big investment for a lego purchase but well worth it if you're a StarWars Fan, a Lego fan, or enjoy "puzzles" or models!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher V. Gordy

customer_reviews.title: When u open the box. You think wtf did I get myself into lol
customer_reviews.text: This model is awesome. When u get the box, you’ll think to yourself what the heck did I get into. The instruction manual is 20 pounds and larger than a dictionary. Make sure you have about 40+ hours for this build because it’s a monster. Over 50 separate bags. Also invest in display for the model if u plan on placing on a shelf after completion. Don’t think, just buy. Must have for all star wars junkies.
customer_reviews.author: Randi West

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Very technical. Will be a huge endeavor. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We started building this in the spring and put it away for summer. We're back at it now in November. What a huge, expert-level project. There's minor frustration at so many small parts and lots of mistakes, even for Dad, but we're powering through it. It's not a quickly satisfying project like smaller sets.
customer_reviews.author: T Howard

customer_reviews.title: very intense and tedious build but soooo worth it in the end
customer_reviews.text: one of the most epic Lego Star Wars sets of all time...very intense and tedious build but soooo worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S Howard

customer_reviews.title: Definitely warm. Definitely thick. Thanks for keeping it awkward Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how to gauge the thickness of warmth of a LEGO set ... but I will say the box is pretty thick and it made me all warm and fuzzy unboxing it. For that alone I felt it deserved all 5 stars in both categories. As for value for money, I only gave it that rating since I was able to get it for 40% off on Black Friday. Just a warning : definitely pay attention to the size of the build. It’s all fun and games until you’re done and don’t really have a good place to put it. I had to sacrifice my office desk until I could find another table just to mount it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: This was the most amazing thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I wish the entire Star Wars universe was available in this detailed complex set. I would retire early and just sit home and build them.
customer_reviews.author: TechNerd

customer_reviews.title: Impressive lego set and time consuming
customer_reviews.text: As far as the quality and value of this lego set, it's 5 stars for sure. It takes a long time to put it together, got kind of annoying towards the end. Also make sure you have a plan on what to do with it after you put it together. It's big and fragile. I wish lego would sell a display case for it. You can get 3rd party ones that goes for a couple of hundred bucks.
customer_reviews.author: krisman

customer_reviews.title: Even though the box was not damaged the instructions were, due to packaging arrangement.
customer_reviews.text: Lego has a fantastic reputation for quality, so naturally I expected the largest set made to date to be special. However, somewhere along the design line Lego faltered. After printing the massive instruction book on ring bound paper (which will deteriorate and rip if looked at more than a few times) they decided to package the book on its end?!? Leading to damage straight out of the box. The art on the front and sides of the box suggest it be on its side, but this puts the heavy instruction book on its end, and it cannot support itself even unopened.
customer_reviews.author: Abram

customer_reviews.title: 100% the best lego build my Dad and I have ever done
customer_reviews.text: 100% the best lego build my Dad and I have ever done. I would 100% recommend spending the money on this. If you are borderline, just do it. A tremendous experience!
customer_reviews.author: MikeP

customer_reviews.title: If you have the means, I highly recommend picking one up, it is so choice.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bad boy on display for a good six months and I still stop to gawk at it almost every time I go by. If you enjoy the building process, you'll definitely get your money's worth, as it can easily take a couple weeks if you work on it an hour or two a night. I have mine on a nice plexiglass stand that puts it at a near vertical angle, which not only looks amazing, it also significantly reduces the amount of real estate required, a narrow bookcase or dresser is now an option. Get it, build it, love it. And may the force be with you.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D Mills

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, that said, there were a couple of critical blocks missing that we had to supplement with other we had already...and the replacements still haven't shipped. Update: Replacements were quite easy to order over the phone or online. Moved back to 5 stars as they fixed the problem as good as any customer service could.
customer_reviews.author: Nic.K

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces or Wrong pieces
customer_reviews.text: Started completing and putting it together. The product has some pieces missing, no set of stickers for the right areas and no instruction book. Don’t buy definitely not worth the full price
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star because of how awesome it is but when i got my box brand new they was already box damage redone to it . But i love it came in two days and from lego it self . If you watch people building it the box is bigger then it looks ! Seriously .
customer_reviews.author: Zachary pittman

customer_reviews.title: Best build ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is overwhelming at first, but 100% worth it as a Lego lover. The level of detail and options for both OG trilogy and new film trilogy options makes it extra cool so both old and new fans can get their preferred look out of the model. It's 17 steps worth of bags, but each step is between 1-2 big bags and 2-3 smaller bags of pieces. Do yourself a favor and lay things out when emptying bags, and put all assumed empty bags in a common location so you can pull things back out if a flat 1x1 piece got stuck in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: K. Watka

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the time and money
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set is amazing! As always, the attention to detail is excellent. My husband and I built the set together - taking turns sorting pieces and assembling. It took us about a week to finish but the result is spectacular. Be sure to stay organized!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer7993

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot of fun to put together. Took about a week but that was by doing a few hours a night. Couple of things that would make it a little easier - make the book split into sections if possible. Only one person could be looking at the book but there were parts that could be put together separately. Also having to lift the ship to add more things did not work well once it was mostly assembled. Pieces kept coming off and it took forever to find the place in the book to find where to put it back. Overall - it's super cool to look at.
customer_reviews.author: N. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Kids and I love it. Legos are a good way for kids learn how to count, learn colors, listen, follow directions and the importance of family time and working together to achieve a goal. My kids are three and six. This build is the sixth Lego set we have assembled and they looking forward to the next.
customer_reviews.author: charles f.

customer_reviews.title: Every little detail is impressive
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who grew up playing with LEGO everyday and also considers them self a STAR WARS geek deserves to experience building this! Every little detail is impressive, and I don't mean just the model itself. The way it's packaged with four individual inner boxes and artwork that flows from one box to the next accompanied with lines from the movies about the Falcon is just cool. Part of my obsession with LEGO as an adult is how clever and how much calculated thought goes into designing the sets and this one is going to make all future models that I build seem boring in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: sfakajones

customer_reviews.title: Absurdly Expensive / Where Else You Gonna Get It?!
customer_reviews.text: This set is no-joke...large box, rather heavy for LEGO. And...absolutely the most expensive @ MSRP. Still, where else are you gonna get it with confidence?! You gotta pay-to-play it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Ted

customer_reviews.title: There is no suggestions for a display case!
customer_reviews.text: Was the best time I've had building in a long time. Now that it is done, I am finding difficulty finding a display case to show my showpiece! I want all to see the geek I am and have this on display in some form of case!
customer_reviews.author: jaccobmvarnik4

customer_reviews.title: Nice but would not suggest.
customer_reviews.text: Its fun to build until you inadvertantly hit one of the other parts and knock it off. Super brittle. Definitely not a toy to be played with. I would suggest one of the smaller versions if you are wanting to play.
customer_reviews.author: LookForTrouble

customer_reviews.title: Monster of a project!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set is amazing, challenging and a monster of a project. I'm giving this 4 stars because some of the packaging was not accurate. Parts in section 6 was also in the packets labeled 9 and it was confusing but overall an amazing piece for anyone who's a collector, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tharindu Athauda

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way to Spend 30+ Hours of One's Life
customer_reviews.text: A long and detail-filled build. A lot of very small parts that look very similar, so if that bothers you....why are you reading a review for the largest Lego set ever sold by Lego??
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wood Baker II

customer_reviews.title: A Lego Challenge!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set!! A great father/son project! Pretty difficult but challenging. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kinsman

customer_reviews.title: Lego's most impressive Star Wars set yet
customer_reviews.text: The cost is high, but this has been one of the most enjoyable lego builds I've ever done. The detail and complexity of the piece made it a great project for my wife and I, we would alternate pages to build. Around 45 to 60 hours together and it's a great conversation piece, though must be handled carefully as it's rather fragile
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Most fun I've had in years
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few weeks of and on to build this. Was a fun build. I loved it, I ALMOST want to smash it and build again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lego
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son He loves it. It has taken solid 26 hours to build
customer_reviews.author: elcin schipp

customer_reviews.title: I think it's the best vehicle design since the Batman Begins LEGO tumbler
customer_reviews.text: One of the biggest and detailed LEGO designs to date. A must have if you're a collector of Star Wars and/or LEGO. I think it's the best vehicle design since the Batman Begins LEGO tumbler. If it is available, I would definitely grab it.
customer_reviews.author: london

customer_reviews.title: Large Workspace Required
customer_reviews.text: The millennium falcon has just become the centerpiece for my coffee table and is impossible to stop staring at. There are over 40 individual bags of legos and the set is still incredibly sturdy considering the dimensions, and the attention to detail on the exterior and interior is remarkable. Such a fun and challenging set!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Brady

customer_reviews.title: 13 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a grandson 13th birthday. He had been spending all of his time playing video games and com-paining that life isn’t fair. Teen stuff. Now he is building this Millennium Falcon and happy.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: I got an engagement ring. He got this.
customer_reviews.text: We both were very surprised and happy. It was a good Valentine’s Day.
customer_reviews.author: Cat B

customer_reviews.title: It has great detail and ready for classic Star Wars scenes and ...
customer_reviews.text: Still somewhat hard to find as I write this in mid March 2018, but it was worth the wait. This is a HUGE set and the box is gigantic. It's an expensive set, but it's seriously huge. Don't expect to put this together in a few days. It has great detail and ready for classic Star Wars scenes and newer ones. Seems like a classic Luke Skywalker should have been included for $800, but such is life. This set is for serious collectors.
customer_reviews.author: N. Franke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Huge; need space to build & display but what a rush putting it together! We broke the bank buying it!
customer_reviews.author: MKK

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for his birthday. He was very excited. He’s been wanting this for quite awhile. The engineering is amazing. At this writing, it is approximately 25% complete. The next issue:display!
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Me very, very, HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: I save a lot of money towards my next summer vacation but the coronavirus pretty much pooched everything forcing me to cancel my plans. So being stuck at home with nowhere to go and nothing else to do I realized that I still had all the money I had saved and remembered this mega sized Lego model from one of my favorite movies and thought "What the hey?" and was lucky enough to order it online at its regular price.
customer_reviews.author: Wigberto Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Boxed totally secure
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the original lego box would be receive damaged. It was in PERFECT condition. You first have the sealed lego box, then it is sealed in a brown box and then there is another second larger brown box. The outside brown box was dinged up as you would anticipate but the second one inside it and the lego box itself were pristine. I am over the moon about this purchase. The seller is great!
customer_reviews.author: KHans14

customer_reviews.title: Its a MONSTER!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Well worth the hours of fun put in to see this monster on display.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: The box is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually tackled the project yet, but it's an impressive box and instruction book..
customer_reviews.author: JESSE CARO

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Huge LEGO set. Very nice. Very tedious to build. But worry the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Herman W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Lego Set Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate lego set, regardless of If you are a starwars fan. A great sense of accomplishment when you finish it. A great item to amaze your friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Garage_gamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks at 3 hours a day. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Steep price, but if you're a Star Wars (original trilogy or the extended crap) and LEGO fan it is a must-have. Lots of hours building plus plenty more admiring it. Everyone you know will want to come see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Lego set! Takes a lot of time and patience, but worth it in the end. Great parent/child activity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fixed the shipping issues
customer_reviews.text: I read a bunch of reviews saying the box arrived damaged. Amazon seem to have taken note. Mine came in a big outer box, sturdy Lego cardboard box and then the actual item box (so triple boxed). Everything arrived in perfect shape. Ready to start building now and I’m sure it will be spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Epic LEGO build.
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome. Had my best friend to help build.
customer_reviews.author: M. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest Lego ever made, if my information is correct. For Star Wars and Lego fans it is an absolute must have.
customer_reviews.author: Rostow Ravanan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This box is huge. Shipped perfectly! I’m looking forward to building this with my kids one day!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tam

customer_reviews.title: Lego Alderaan!
customer_reviews.text: A shload of legos! Takes a long time to put together but worth every brick if you are a fan of the Falcon.
customer_reviews.author: Jackal

customer_reviews.title: Mega Build
customer_reviews.text: One heck of a Lego Set, daughter worked on it for almost 2 weeks... I consider her a "Master Builder "
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: it is really big and awesome lego ı've ever seen.even if u dont fan of star wars, again be sure u love it
customer_reviews.author: Hazar Zorluer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After numerous near misses.. finally secured it during a restock wave. NEVER give in to sculpers!
customer_reviews.author: Ark

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Was fun,but the engineering stinks!! Most parts are only holding on by one dot,,,it will fall into hundred pieces just looking at it !!
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: It's Legos! Enough said
customer_reviews.text: Yes I am one of the morons that spent 800 for a toy; but, it's so worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy wuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set, fun and challenging to build!
customer_reviews.text: Most amazingly fun lego ive built to this day, challenging yet fun, looks great on display!!!! Worth every cent
customer_reviews.author: Brandon wood

customer_reviews.title: A collector's treasure
customer_reviews.text: These all ran out of the market. Fortunately was able to get this here at the same price and not those jacked up ones. A real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Lors Yu

customer_reviews.title: Good Fun for Days
customer_reviews.text: The set is amazing. It's really fun to put together. It took me about 3 days total working non-stop. It is really big though, so only get it if you have a place to put it that's big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Fly Casual
customer_reviews.text: It’s the greatest LEGO set I’ve ever assembled and I’ve been building them for 30 years
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mangiaracina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SO MANY PCS! Takes a while to build but its Amazingly detailed.
customer_reviews.author: FSL

customer_reviews.title: Best set ever
customer_reviews.text: My dreams as a kid have finally come true building this set.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, but awesome
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces and extra pieces. Looks awesome though, my boyfriend absolutely loved it. Fun to build, and crazy huge.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Gajeski

customer_reviews.title: Superior condition!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in original box from the manufacturer. Superior condition!
customer_reviews.author: Ilia Roussev

customer_reviews.title: The largest Lego set ever and it's the Millennium Falcon. What's not to love!?
customer_reviews.text: Oh man - what's not to love? First, it's the Millennium Falcon. Second, it's the largest lego set ever. I had a great time building this thing! The detail is simply stunning, and I almost wish I could build it again. There were some surprises in the build I wasn't aware of, that made it that much cooler. I won't give it away. If you're on the fence, just buy the damn thing. It's going to be discontinued in a few years anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Regan

customer_reviews.title: The greatest and biggest LEGO SET and it's a beauty$
customer_reviews.text: I love Legos and star wars. This will be my centerpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👏
customer_reviews.text: Display in my Theater Room with my 75 inch 3D TV 📺 !!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Wow...this is huge 🤗
customer_reviews.text: Best buy ever! My son LOVED it and almost thru putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Very time consuming but wort it
customer_reviews.text: I loved putting this set together but be ready it's not easy ALOT of little detail parts and very time consuming.If you have a family expect not to see them till its completed
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Walsh

customer_reviews.title: The recipient was quite pleased
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that grandson was fully engaged for four days put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Philip C. Rush

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Falcon
customer_reviews.text: Have built four sections of the total 17 section product. A lot of work but completely fun at the same time. Looking forward to the final so I can display it.
customer_reviews.author: MPR

customer_reviews.title: I want to work at Lego!
customer_reviews.text: Best 800$ I ever spent. Star wars Lego is my childhood! Please make a 501st battle pack
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Know where you are going to put this thing before you buy it. It's horkin' massive!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing detail! Hours and hours of building enjoyment! Makes an incredible display piece!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about how awesome this thing is. Fan boy's dream.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bellinder

customer_reviews.title: Just go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing just amazing. Brings my childhood back - a joy I can share with the kids. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: D-rex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and huge
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for husband and he is excited so much till christmas day i bought this cheaper than any sellers thank you so much great product
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: attention to detail is extreme
customer_reviews.text: impressive attention to detail not one thing was left out in the design of thiss product
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the most interesting Lego set I have built to date.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Star Wars and Lego Fans must have owned it before it out of stock
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Each section could be their own quality set, really special Lego build
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: The best lego set on the planet
customer_reviews.text: The best lego set on the planet! Had a blast with this build but now I have to find a spot for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One massive lego
customer_reviews.text: For those who is worrying about box condition, it comes in Lego box inside Amazon box(double boxed). Mine was mint no damage to the box. Box is like 3' by 3' and weighs about 30lb. One massive lego. Most expensive lego I ever bought, no regret!
customer_reviews.author: Lego My Eggo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: Only thing from holding back 5th star is no stand like other UCS sets and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hanz  M.

customer_reviews.title: One amazing kit. Everything was done right to include the ...
customer_reviews.text: One amazing kit. Everything was done right to include the well designed book that is spiral bound and includes reading and pictures from the movie. Love it and hope to see more kits at this caliber.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Tmo

customer_reviews.title: Huge and nice!maybe takes two months for completion
customer_reviews.text: What a heavy box when I received.really take a long time to count and organize all the bricks.after two weeks,I am still on it.it is really huge size once you finish,I might put it in the garage rather than in my bedroom:( and you had better buy a show case for it.Anyway,a good collection from lego!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best set from LEGO
customer_reviews.text: Outer LEGO packaging box was torn, but luckily the LEGO box itself didn’t get any scratch; it’s a wonderful set, and I’m still working on it, the instruction book were easy to understand and easy to follow, so far the building experience is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Asian Rice

customer_reviews.title: I could not be more happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more happy with this purchase. Took around 40 man hours to knock this bad boy out, but it was worth every drop of sweat and every cramped hand. It might go without saying, but this set it NOT for little kids; this is a finely crafted, detail oriented display piece. If you have the inclination, and the cash to blow, pick up the largest production Lego set made thus far. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing, nothing else needs to be said.
customer_reviews.text: its amazing. I just don't know if I can build it in less than 12 parsecs

customer_reviews.title: Best Lego set ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Lego set ever. It just took me a long time to get it and I was so happy that I could get one from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TommyQin

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: If there was ever a set to own, it’s this one. Took me off and on almost 3 weeks. Make space to display it and more to build it because once it’s finished you don’t wanna move it. Only complaint is that there’s no “official” way to display it. Say an official LEGO Death Star loading bay or Mos Eisley, making the falcon the center piece of something truly epic.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Duenas

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: Amazon! First time I have been disappointed. My box arrived with the corners bent/smashed. As far as the LEGO set I cannot describe how excited I am to own this beautiful set........amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gutierrez

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars Ultimate Millennium Falcon 75192 Expert Building Kit and Starship Model, Best Gift and Movie Collectible for Adults (7541 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Welcome to the largest, most detailed LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon model we've ever created—in fact, with 7,500 pieces it's one of our biggest LEGO models, period! This advanced LEGO interpretation of Han Solo's unforgettable Corellian freighter has all the details that Star Wars fans of any age could wish for, including intricate exterior detailing, upper and lower quad laser cannons, landing legs, lowering boarding ramp and a 4-minifigure cockpit with detachable canopy. Remove individual hull plates to reveal the highly detailed main hold, rear compartment and gunnery station. This amazing model also features interchangeable sensor dishes and crew, so you decide whether to play out classic LEGO Star Wars adventures with Han, Leia, Chewbacca and C-3PO, or enter the world of Episode VII: The Force Awakens and VIII: The Last Jedi with older Han, Rey, Finn and BB-8! This space vehicle was also featured in the recent film – Solo: A Star Wars Story. This is the perfect gift for any Star Wars fan!
feature_bullets: Defend the Galaxy and build the largest LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon to date! The perfect set for adult Star Wars fans and expert builders, This starship will inspire hours of play recreating the films or can be displayed as a collectible toy model

The Millennium Falcon is built with 7,541 pieces and includes two crews of minifigures - 4 classic crew minifigures: Han Solo, Chewbacca, Princess Leia and C-3PO, plus 3 Star Wars Episode VII/VIII crew minifigures: Older Han Solo, Rey and Finn

Main hold features a seating area, Dejarik holographic game, combat remote training helmet, and engineering station with turning minifigure seat, Rear compartment features the engine room with hyperdrive and console and 2 escape Pod hatches

Exterior features include detailed removable hull panels, lowering boarding ramp, concealed blaster cannon, 4-minifigure cockpit with detachable canopy, interchangeable round/rectangular sensor dishes

Measures over 8 inches (21cm) high, 33 inches (84cm) long and 22 inches (56cm) wide Builders can slide the panel to reveal the concealed blaster cannon and turn classic Leia’s and Han’s head to reveal their breathing mask decorations
